Package divisioner

Class Divisioner

java.lang.Object
divisioner.Divisioner
public class Divisioner extends Object
Functionality to division AST into positive and negative variability variation points
Author:
Jakub Perdek

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Divisioner()
    Creates the instance of functionality to division AST into positive and negative variability variation points -as default strategy is used RecallStrategy()
    Divisioner(VariationPointDivisionConfiguration variationPointDivisionConfiguration)
    Creates the instance of functionality to division AST into positive and negative variability variation points

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.json.simple.JSONObject
    divisionToVPHierarchic(org.json.simple.JSONObject astTreeRoot, String fileName, boolean useTypes)
    Hierarchically divisions variation points according provided AST (TypeScript) -initializes root inner context and global context -launches variation points divisioning - positive and negative variability -outputs ordered structure
    CodeContext
    getCodeContextFromDivision()
    Returns code context that is used for divisioning
    VariationPointDivisionConfiguration

    • divisionToVPHierarchic

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject divisionToVPHierarchic(org.json.simple.JSONObject astTreeRoot, String fileName, boolean useTypes) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Hierarchically divisions variation points according provided AST (TypeScript) -initializes root inner context and global context -launches variation points divisioning - positive and negative variability -outputs ordered structure
      Parameters:
      astTreeRoot - - the root of processed AST
      fileName - - the name of parsed AST
      useTypes - - if types should be used if found during divisioning, especially context/contexts preparation
      Returns:
      divisioned AST (particular code) into variation points
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation
